alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 9:21PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinal County through 945 PM MST... At 921 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Casa Grande, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Coolidge, Blackwater, Arizola, Magma, San Tan Valley and Valley Farms. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 185 and 197. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 130 and 146. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
